articles.title: Infected South Korean Coronavirus Health Official Member of Secretive Religious Group Linked to Hundreds of Cases
articles.description: More than half of the country's total coronavirus cases have been reported in Daegu.

articles.title: Homeland Security Deputy Secretary Cuccinelli Criticized for Asking Twitter Where to Find Coronavirus Information
articles.description: Acting Deputy Secretary Ken Cuccinelli came under fire Monday for asking Twitter for alternate sources for information after having trouble accessing Johns Hopkins University's coronavirus map.
articles.content:
Homeland Security Acting Deputy Secretary Ken Cuccinelli came under fire for asking Twitter if others had trouble accessing Johns Hopkins University's COVID-19 coronavirus map Monday.

articles.title: U.S. Sanctions Hamper Iran's Battle to Contain Coronavirus
articles.description: Iran is racing to curb the coronavirus' spread, but these efforts are complicated by U.S. economic restrictions and frustrations among the population.
articles.content:
Iran is racing to curb the rapid, deadly spread of the new coronavirus, but these efforts are complicated by tight economic restrictions imposed by the United States and frustrations among an increasingly embattled population.

articles.title: Coronavirus Italy Update: Europe's First Major Outbreak Sees Fourth Death From the Virus, More Than 150 Cases Confirmed
articles.description: More than 50,000 residents in the northern Italian regions of Lombardy and Veneto are on lockdown.
articles.content: A fourth person has died after contracting the coronavirus in Italy. The country has seen more than 150 confirmed cases since Friday, with thousands remaining on lockdown in parts of northern Italy. The latest cases mark the first major outbreak in Europe, wh… [+5628 chars]
